name: easy-ocr
title: Easy OCR
description: Use Tesseract or Google Cloud Vision OCR to extract text from screenshot
author: Rafo94

commands.name: index
commands.title: Area OCR
commands.subtitle: Tesseract
commands.description: Select screen area which you want to extract the text

preferences.name: tesseract_path
preferences.title: Tesseract binary path
preferences.description: Absolute path to your tesseract binary - check documentation if default path is not correct - required only if using tesseract

preferences.name: tesseract_lang
preferences.title: Tesseract language
preferences.description: Language which will be used for OCR - required only if using tesseract. Check tesseract --list-langs for available languages.

preferences.name: newLine
preferences.title: How to treat new lines (\n)?
preferences.description: OCR engines can read new lines and they interpret them as \n, this option gives you ability to swap them out
